channel.title: Deconstructing the Hunter class
channel.description:
(I like hunter, but I like being an asshole more)
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Passive 1 (Revenge): If found guilty of treason, kill your accuser before your execution.
_this can be terrible for BD, such as if you were framed by the scorned and get sheriff/paladin killed._
----------------------- Passive 2 (Isolation): Occupy immune.
_just turned this class into claim for possessor (killer _ occupy immune), will probably be killed by prince all the time._
-------------------------- Night Ability 1 (Wolf Companion): 1 use Summon a wolf companion to attack a player. They will bleed and die in 2 days.
_A killer class who's only ability that allows him to select who he will kill has 1 use._ _additionally, the hunter has fund someone he so strongly believes to be scum that he uses his 1 use on them, and he has to wait 2 days for them to die. OK if he is 1 v 1 the assassin and has his 2 traps left._
--------------------------------------------- Night Ability 2 (Spike Traps): 2 uses Set spiked traps in your home to hurt intruders. If trapped, the visitor will bleed and die in 2 days, if untreated. You will be night immune.
_like this one, nothing bad to say really._
--------------------------- Bleeding players can be healed by either the Physician or Alchemist.
_tryna make the alchemist side with scum more often, eh?_
---------------------- Complaint in general:
-Only three nights of ability use
------------------------------ Over all, I think this class is good, lot of guess work though.
